meanings.definition: Given or awarded as an honor without the usual duties or privileges.
meanings.sent1: The club recognized her with an honoraries award for her exceptional service.
meanings.sent2: The honoraries certificate was proudly displayed on the wall.
meanings.sent3: Receiving the honoraries badge made her feel like a superstar for a day.
meanings.sent4: The honoraries title shone brightly among her achievements.
meanings.sent5: The honoraries distinction added a special sparkle to her resume.

meanings.definition: A person who holds an honorary position or title.
meanings.sent1: The university invited him to join the honoraries for his contributions.
meanings.sent2: She was proud to be part of the honoraries at the charity event.
meanings.sent3: Becoming an honoraries meant he now had a fancy title to impress his friends.
meanings.sent4: The honoraries stood out in the crowd with their distinguished attire.
meanings.sent5: The honoraries gathered for a special ceremony to celebrate their roles.
